titles.title: A resolution recognizing the teachers of the United States for their contributions to the development and progress of our country.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 5/8/2013--Passed Senate without amendment. Thanks teachers for their service. Promotes the teaching profession. Recognizes students, parents, school administrators, and public officials who participate in National Teacher Appreciation Week.
